CustomField.formula: CASE( Stars__c , 5, IMAGE("/img/samples/stars_500.gif", "5"), 4, IMAGE("/img/samples/stars_400.gif", "4"), 3, IMAGE("/img/samples/stars_300.gif", "3"), 2, IMAGE("/img/samples/stars_200.gif", "2"), 1, IMAGE("/img/samples/stars_100.gif", "1"), IMAGE("/img/samples/stars_000.gif", "0") )
CustomField.label: Estrellas
